extension.summary: Provides rich media info and artwork to skins.
extension.description: Skin Info Service provides additional properties such as ratings, artwork, and stream details for movies, sets, artists, and albums. Includes a gif poster scanner tool to automatically find and add animated gif posters to your library.
extension.news:
